titles.title: Without Him I Can Do Nothing

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Without Him I can do nothing
Without Him I'd surely fail
Without Him I would be drifting
Like a ship without a sail

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
With Jesus I can do all things
With Jesus I cannot fail
With Jesus all things are possible
In His Name I shall prevail

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus, Oh Jesus, Do you know Him today
Do not turn away
Oh Jesus, Oh Jesus.
Without Him, how lost I would be.
